description.text:
I am a full-stack developer with experience in building high-quality web applications. I have
worked on different projects and stages of development, from planning and design to
implementation and maintenance, always seeking to offer efficient solutions tailored to the
needs of my clients. I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina, and have an advanced level of
English proficiency (C2).

skillsDescription.text: Here are some of the tools and technologies I have been working with recently:

jobCards.responsabilities:
In the current project where I work as a Full Stack Developer,
I am utilizing design patterns such as Factory, SOLID, and
Observer along with technologies like React.js and Kotlin to
ensure efficient and high-quality development. Additionally,
I implement Test-driven development at every stage of the
project and work in different development environments to
ensure optimal implementation of the project.

As a Full Stack Developer, I apply agile methodologies to
ensure efficiency and timely delivery in each project. My focus
is on providing high-quality solutions, and I continuously seek
opportunities to improve my skills as a developer.

As a Freelance Graphic Designer, I have developed skills to
meet deadlines and manage my time efficiently. In addition,
I have experience working with clients and meeting their
expectations, which allows me to offer a quality service.

ctaContactText.text: The more details you include, the easier it will be for us to get back to you.

seo.title: Mariano Guillaume - Full Stack Developer
seo.description: Soy un desarrollador full stack con experiencia en construir aplicaciones web de alta calidad.
